title: College World Series 2025 score: LSU's Kade Anderson makes argument for No. 1 pick with shutout win in Game 1 - Yahoo Sports
summary: LSU's Kade Anderson delivers a standout performance, strengthening his bid for the No. 1 pick in the 2025 MLB Draft with a shutout win against Coastal Carolina in Game 1 of the Men's College World Series.
why_matters: Kade Anderson's exceptional performance in a high-stakes game highlights his potential as a top MLB Draft pick, impacting both his career trajectory and the future of the team that selects him.
